answers.answer: Hello,Exercising is great and best when done early morning on empty stomach .The biggest meal of the day should be your breakfast.A heavy breakfast boosts your metabolism. It also prevents obesity and onset of diabetes mellitus. An ideal breakfast should contain fruit servings, whole grains and a protein source. After eating a large breakfast, you will feel more satisfied and less deprived throughout the day. Drink plenty of water daily. Your dinner should be light. I hope it helps.Take care and regards!
